title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Kids & Youth         Complete the Junior Ranger Program and earn your very own badge! NPS  Have fun while exploring Fort Larned with the Junior Ranger Program!  Kids who finish the booklet will earn a badge and be sworn in as official Fort Larned National Historic Site Junior Rangers.  You can also download the booklet if you'd like to check it out before you visit. You can also become a WebRanger on-line! And be sure to ask a park ranger about the annual Junior Ranger Day. Boy Scouts and Girl Scouts can work toward Scout Ranger badges at Fort Larned. Learn more about the Scout Ranger Program. Hey kids! Have you met Buddy Bison? Click here and discover the parks Buddy Bison has visited!  buddybison.org/
